content.raw:
Hi @vincentrou , thanks for catching that! The fix could probably be backported to gazebo7 too.

I haven't tried this yet, but I haven't seen any instances of SDF\_PROTOCOL\_VERSIONbeing used in the code. Instead, SDF\_VERSION is usually used, see [this](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7522abe667055b3a3da61796270f7fb87467d81e/gazebo/gui/ModelMaker.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#ModelMaker.cc-160) example.

‌

Hi @vincentrou , thanks for catching that! The fix could probably be backported to gazebo7 too.

I haven't tried this yet, but I haven't seen any instances of SDF_PROTOCOL_VERSIONbeing used in the code. Instead, SDF_VERSION is usually used, see this example.
